{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = UDOO Neo |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.udoo.org/udoo-neo/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = UDOO |model = NEO |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Basic |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6SX;MCIMX6X, 4EVM10AB; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9<!-- ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.0GHz/(Cortex-M4) @200MHz --> |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Microchip;KSZ8091; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.14.56;Ubuntu 14.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pad header,, J11
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI, LVDS, SPDIF, RTC w/ battery, CAN Bus, GPIO, I2C, I2S, SPI |addchip = PMIC;NXP;MC32PF3000;;1; ,,, Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1; ,,, 0.5A Dual Channel Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2152A;;1; ,,, 340kHz, 3A Synchronous DC-DC Buck Converter;BCD Semi;AP3503F;;2; ,,, Triple 2-Channel Analog Multiplexer/Demultiplexer;Toshiba; 74VHC4053AFT;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = udooer |defaultpass = udooer |manuf = SECO |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 6.0, Armbian (unofficial),
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2015 |estprice = 35 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''www.udoo.org'', ''CSA69REVD'' and ''BD REVD'' are silkscreened on bottom of board.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' i.MX 6SoloX (MCIMX6X4EVM10AB) :ARM Cortex-A9 @1GHz and Cortex-M4 @200MHz *GPU: ''Vivante GC420'' *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Onboard Storage: TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card slot *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB OTG
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.udoo.org/docs-neo/Introduction/Introduction.html ''UDOO Neo Documentation'' on '''UDOO.org''' Docs] *[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/udoo/udoo-neo-raspberry-pi-arduino-wi-fi-bt-40-sensors ''UDOO Neo = Raspberry Pi + Arduino + Wi-Fi + BT 4.0 + Sensors'' on '''Kickstarter'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/02/25/udoo-neo-development-board-is-powered-by-freescale-i-mx-6solox-processor/ ''UDOO Neo Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==See also== *[[UDOO Dual]] *[[UDOO Quad]] *[[UDOO NEO Basic]] *[[UDOO NEO Full]]
